todolist.title: Buy groceries
todolist.description: Purchase milk, eggs, bread, and vegetables from the supermarket.

todolist.title: Meeting with client
todolist.description: Discuss project updates and future plans with the client at their office.

todolist.title: Workout session
todolist.description: Go to the gym for a 1-hour workout including cardio and strength training.

todolist.title: Submit project report
todolist.description: Finalize and submit the project report to the manager before the deadline.

todolist.title: Doctor's appointment
todolist.description: Routine check-up with Dr. Smith at the downtown clinic.
